title: Email Design
desc: Our simple, intuitive drag & drop email designer will help unleash your creativity in a short time, enabling you send emails to your contacts in minutes.

title: Template Gallery
desc: Our collection of pre-designed templates allows you to create eye-catching emails swiftly. Just select a design that suites you & customize it to fit your needs.

title: Personalization of Emails
desc: Customize your emails using your recipients' name, contact and custom information.

title: Scheduled Campaigns
desc: Effortlessly plan your campaigns for future delivery to contacts. We will automatically handle the rest for you.

title: Contact Segmentation
desc: Effortlessly organize your contacts by categorizing them and customizing campaigns & emails for them.

title: Email Activity Reports
desc: Detailed analysis of clicks and open rates for every campaign & mail delivered to your audience.

title: Manage Your Media & Files
desc: Embed images and files in your emails and campaigns by uploading them directly on seamailer.

title: Connect Your Applications
desc: Easily send emails via your applications with Seamailer's APi and SDK integrations.
